g1.title: `tusk` Command Implementation
g1.notes: Complete implementation with all 8 commands, comprehensive features, and production-quality code

g2.title: `tusk-dotnet` Command Implementation
g2.notes: Complete .NET-specific tooling with 8 commands, project scaffolding, MSBuild integration, and runtime configuration

g4.title: File System Operations & I/O
